# alg

**Type**

An algorithm used to sign a JSON Web Signature.

## Declaration

```swift
string alg
```

## Data types

- **x5c**: The JSON Web Signature (JWS) header parameter that contains the certificate chain that corresponds to the key used to digitally sign the JWS.

items.description: The JSON Web Signature (JWS) header parameter that contains the certificate chain that corresponds to the key used to digitally sign the JWS.
